text:
[Verse]
Stars above they shine so bright
In the stillness of the night
Dreams take flight with every sigh
Underneath the endless sky

[Verse 2]
Moonlight whispers secrets true
In the night I think of you
Hopes and wishes drifting far
Chasing wonders where you are

[Chorus]
Starlit dreams they guide us home
Never lost we'll never roam
In the night we'll find our way
Starlit dreams and endless day

[Verse 3]
Footsteps soft on silver sand
Hand in hand across the land
Echoes of the night we find
Memories of love entwined

[Chorus]
Starlit dreams they guide us home
Never lost we'll never roam
In the night we'll find our way
Starlit dreams and endless day

[Bridge]
When the dawn breaks light and clear
Know that I will hold you near
Through the dark and through the light
Starlit dreams we'll take flight
title: Starlit Dreams
